ygData.subject: Re: A few things--thanks
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks Michael for the info.  I have a couple of questions concerning the strength bonus to attack and the double attack.  I am about to go to 18th level as a
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks Michael for the info. I have a couple of questions concerning the
strength bonus to attack and the double attack. I am about to go to 18th
level as a Paladin on Innoruuk and have a shiny brass halberd as well. The
most I hit for with it so far is 29 damage. I know I get double attack at
19th but I have seen guys hitting with the halberd for about 34 damage and I
assume it is from the strength bonus. At what level does the strength bonus
kick in for attack? I have 95 native strength. What is the formula for
figuring your max damage with the halberd? Thanks for all your information
and look forward to hearing from you.

Grod


-----Original Message-----
From: Michael Lewis [mailto:mllewis@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 27, 1999 8:53 AM
To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
Subject: [eqpaladin] A few things


From: Michael Lewis <mllewis@...>

Just to answer some questions I've seen arise.



In the service of Lord Brell
Anguss, Paladin of the 3rd Rank
